releaseNotes: New assistant to configure Test Plan Schedule records.
Defects can easily be raised from Test Execution and Test Step Execution records.
Added support for weekly and on-demand Coverage Reporting Schedule executions.
Added support for one-off Test Plan Schedule executions.
Added support to schedule Code Scans using 3rd-party plugins.
Upgraded pages to use dynamic forms and dynamic related lists.
Increased timeout limit for Salesforce and Generic API callouts to 120 seconds.

plugins.description: Connect to your Jira Cloud org, import projects and issues into Provar Manager, relate test cases to issues, and export defects as bugs back into Jira.
releaseNotes: Updated old icons to new Provar Manager icons.
Added usage analytics.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to work items and see their execution status per environment from within the work item itself.
releaseNotes: Relate test cases to work items using Work Item Test Case records.
Map PM system records to DOC environment records to show test executions on work item records.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to branches and see their execution status per environment from within the branch itself.
releaseNotes: Relate test cases to branches using Branch Test Case records.
Map PM system records to Flosum org records to show test executions on branch records.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to user stories and see their execution status per environment from within the user story itself.
releaseNotes: Relate test cases to user stories using User Story Test Case records.
Map PM system records to Copado environment records to show test executions on user story records.

plugins.description: Connect to QualityClouds and retrieve code scans so they can be analysed in Provar Manager.
releaseNotes: Store QualityClouds API Token for each System record.
Get Code Scans on schedule or on-demand from the System record.

plugins.description: Connect to Clayton and retrieve code scans so they can be analysed in Provar Manager.
releaseNotes: Define Clayton accounts and projects that match the structure in Clayton.
Get Code Scans on schedule or on-demand from the System record.

plugins.description: Connect to your Azure DevOps org, import projects and work items into Provar Manager, relate test cases to work items, and export defects as bugs back into Azure DevOps.
releaseNotes: Connect Provar Manager to Azure DevOps.
Import projects with their work item types and work item relation types.
Import work items of any type.
Send bugs to Azure DevOps from the defect record and have it automatically linked to the related work item.
